data.text: @GeorgeMo Hi, you have the case #27326883 in which we are working on. Please, remain aware of our contact via email. Regards.

@marcelo_esperon Hello, according to your comments and in order to provide you further information, please send us your booking code or ticket number via DM. Have in mind that our flights are subject to change and subject to every government restrictions. Regards.
@GeorgeMo Hello, we will provide more information via email regarding your claim, within the next 2 days. Regards.
@GeorgeMo Hello, we sent you a DM.
@GeorgeMo Hello, in order to assist you, please send us your booking code via DM. We will wait for your reply.
@FioreMastrangel Te hemos enviado un DM. Saludos.
@Rafadelos Hola, por favor bríndanos tu número de ticket por DM, quedamos atentos.
@marcelo_esperon Hi, in order to provide you further information, please send us via DM your booking code or ticket number and complete name. We will await for your reply. Regards.
@FioreMastrangel Hola, indícanos por DM el nombre completo de los pasajeros. Asimismo, te sugerimos eliminar tu comentario ya que contiene información personal. Quedamos atentos.

@DrRicardoBianco Hello, since you mentioned that you still have not received the transfer, we will look into this issue under the following case number: 27280073. Remember that we will contact you via email as soon as possible.
@gerardofaria10 Hola, por favor envíanos tu código de reserva y más detalles de lo ocurrido por DM. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta.
@DrRicardoBianco Your request was processed on August 13th, 2020. You can check on your account statement that information. Regards.
@DrRicardoBianco We can see that your transfer is still in process; however, this may take longer than usual due to the high amount of requests at the moment.
@DrRicardoBianco Hi Ricardo, we verify that the transfer is still in process and as soon as we get an update on this will send you an email. Thanks for your comprehension.
@dpaik323 Hi, send us a DM with your ticket number to look into it. Thanks.

@Shaavis Hi, to be able to send you a DM, you'll need to write us first. Also, when you do so, send us your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and your full name. We'll stay tuned.
@FioreMastrangel Hi, please contact your travel agency. Regards.
@mmaluff We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@mmaluff Mauricio, please send us a DM and let us know if it is an emotional support dog. Regards.
@mmaluff If you need assistance, let us know more details through DM.
@mmaluff Hi, if you want to travel with your pet, you can check more information here: https://t.co/um3vo0q9Wb. Regards.

urls.title: Pets transportation service | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Travel with your pet and continue creating memories together. Take it in the cabin or checked, and know the conditions to do it.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: @jamesrobbins97 Hi, for a proper assistance, please choose just one language English, or Portuguese. Thank you.
@flyingdaggergif We have sent you a DM. Regards.

@jrpmendes Hi, to assist you, please give us via DM more details about your request, as well as your full name, case number and e-mail address. Thank you for contacting us. We'll be waiting for your response.
@FioreMastrangel Hi, we've added your comments to your case to streamline the process. Please, stay tuned. Regards.
@cmillard_ Hello, we can assist you if you send us the booking code via DM. We will wait for your reply.

@RachelBalen Hi, let us check the information, please provide via DM, the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.
@martheljc Thank you for contacting us. Do not hesitate to write us back in case of further requests. Regards.

@martheljc Hello, we verify that we do not have any problems on our website. We suggest you to delete cookies or temporary files and try to purchase again your ticket subject to our flight availibility. If the problem continue, please write us back via DM. Regards.

This is @bopinion article on a study conducted by MIT, in which they explain how HEPA filters and the constant renewal of air on our airplanes, contribute to the low odds of getting infected on a flight. #NewWaystoFly  https://t.co/WSCoefbQgY

domain.name: News Vertical
domain.description: News Categories like Entertainment or Technology

data.text: @JonathanHarrig6 We have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@RodNYC1 We've replied through DM, regards.

@RodNYC1 Hi, we are verifying that we do have a direct flight for October 1st from Santiago to New York, it is LA532. We invite you to quote your trip through this link: https://t.co/d5XJx8OJlp. Remember to check the entering restrictions, here: check the entering restrictions. Regards.

urls.title: Cheap flights with LATAM Airlines USA | Official Site
urls.description: Take advantage of the incredible discounts and flight deals offered by LATAM Airlines. Book your trip now and enjoy the best experience

data.text: @StefanieParty Hi, we replied to your private message. Regards.
@pashlu We've replied through DM, regards.
@DemLouisa We are in contact with you and we are working through your case.
@Nbalieiro You are welcome. Regards.
@Nbalieiro Hi, it opens 3 hours before your flight departure time. Regards.
@DemLouisa Hello, we have prioritized your request. Our Customer Service team will contact you as soon as possible. Regards
@liamkidner We replied to your DM. Regards.
@DemLouisa Hi, in order to verify the information and help you, please send us more information via DM and confirm us if you have a case number. We will await for your reply. Regards.
@Nbalieiro Hi, we have sent you a DM. Regards.
@hankhank213 You can verify the airport you will depart from here: https://t.co/2t1kY7srw1. If there is a change, we will send you an email and assist you. Regards.
@hankhank213 Hi, you'll have to get more information about your request with the personal of the airport. Regards.
@fredcfreitas1 Please have the certainty that you will receive your money, the wire transfer is in process. We will let you know through your email when the process has been sorted out. Regards.
@fredcfreitas1 We are with refund terms that are exceeding their own timeframe, so we don't have an estimated deadline. We will contact you when the process has concluded. Regards.

@fredcfreitas1 Hi, rest assured that the bank transfer of your travel vouchers are in process. Remember all refunds are taking longer than usual, we will notify you through your email, once the process has finished. Regards.
@caela_daly Hi, we have sent a response through DM. Regards.
@caela_daly Hi, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@Nbalieiro Hello, if you have a booking code according to that route please send us the information via DM. We will await for your reply. Regards.

@fredcfreitas1 Hello, if you are referring to your TV numbers, they are on refund process and as soon as they get confirmed we will contact you in order to provide you more information. Have in mind that it is taking more time due to the high demand on these requests. Regards.
@MusafirGhoom Our refund process is taking more time than usual. We will contact your travel agency internally and they will contact you. Regards.
@MusafirGhoom Hi, we verify that you did not request the refund for your tickets. For that reason, you'll have to get in contact with your travel agency. Regards.

Buy your ticket to fly until November 30, 2020 and you can reschedule your trip without penalty or fare difference to fly until May 31, 2021. Does not apply for December, January, and February. More information at https://t.co/UzNiWexiHv https://t.co/ugllFEN2Op
@StefanieParty Alright, don't hesitate to contact us again if you need our help. Regards.
@StefanieParty Hi, please send us a DM with the origin, destiny and date of your flight, email address, and ID or passport number (whichever you're using to make the purchase). We await your reply.

@JesusA_InfoSec Hi, Keep in mind that if your ticket was issued by a third party, the travel agency must request and manage your refund process. Otherwise, let us know via DM the reservation code and one of the passengers' full names. We will be waiting for your response.
@liamkidner Hi, we sent you a private message. Regards.
@liamkidner We have sent you a DM. Thanks.
@ffumarola We really apologize, but since the case has been closed, and we provided an answer, let us know what else we can do for you. Regards.

Diogo Nunes participated in flights that transported more than 680 tons of medical supplies from China to South America. Discover more about this mission that took more than 60 hours of flight time. https://t.co/HGLSGesVRJ https://t.co/jy1cy8QBfR
@ffumarola Hello, we answered you by DM, Regards.

@EBTR73 Bear in mind that the case was created in order to provide you with a formal resolution regarding your query. We'll have to keep our position in regard to the response provided. We hope to have to opportunity of assisting you in the future. Regards.
@FioreMastrangel Hi, we are working on your case 26374345, as soon as we have any update about it, we will let you know. Regards.
@velson_dsouza We escalated your case in order to send you a prompt response and your request was added to it. Feel free to contact us for further assistance. Regards.
@velson_dsouza Hi, we answered you via DM. Regards.
@EBTR73 Hi, we've sent you a reply via DM. Regards.
@pashlu Hi, as soon as your request is completed, we will notify you through your email. Regards.
@LagosJAntonio Hola, hemos agregado tus comentarios a tu caso con la finalidad de brindarte una pronta respuesta. Te contaremos vía tus medios de contacto. Saludos.
@EBTR73 Hi, in order to assist you, please let us know via DM the reservation codes and one of the passengers' full names. We will be waiting for your response.

Sebastian Millar is part of the team that made possible the transport of stem cells from Germany to Chile, for 4 cancer patients who urgently needed them to fight this disease. Learn more about this #LATAMSolidaryPlane  https://t.co/5m2mBhKC5i https://t.co/mQZmymgh91

@OtavioDotNet Hello, according to what are you telling us we suggest you to ignore the message you received. On the other hand, if you have problems to log in send us a DM with more information. Regards.
@JonathanHarrig6 We understand your position, but in this case we suggest you stay tuned to your email for any update regarding the refund process. Regards.
@JonathanHarrig6 We replied to the message you sent via DM.

@Cassandrita05 Since the service was acquired through a third company, the refund process must be managed by your agency. Otherwise, let us know the information requested via DM to further assist you. Regards.

@Cassandrita05 Hi, keep in mind that the refund process must be managed by the travel agency since they are your ticket issuers. However, in order to provide you accurate information let us know via DM the reservation code and one of the passengers' full names. We'll be waiting for your reply.
@JC4611 We answered via DM. Regards.
@JC4611 Hi, In order to assist you, please let us know via DM the reservation code and one of the passengers' full names along with more details of your query. We will be waiting for your response.
@DestinyNegrete Hi, let us know through DM more details about your request in order to assist you. We'll be waiting for your reply.
@velson_dsouza Your case, stay tuned to your contact means. Regards.
@velson_dsouza Hi, we are working on your case, as soon as we have more information about it, we will let you know. Regards.

@sarasacarrigan Hello, in order to verify your refund request and provide you further assistance, let us know via DM your reservation code or ticket number and full name of the passengers. We will be waiting for your reply. Kind regards.

@Kangmingjie Hello, bear in mind that we can assist you through this mean, in order to continue, let us know more details regarding your request, if it's associated with your booking let us know via DM your reservation code or ticket number and full name of the passengers. Kind regards.

@ingrid_becker Hello, in order to provide you further assistance with the rescheduling process of your itinerary, let us know your booking code/ticket number along with the full passenger's name via DM. We'll be expecting for your reply in order to proceed. Kind regards.

Emilia Rivadeneira was one of the people responsible for connecting +400 health professionals with patients throughout South America.  Learn about the work of #LATAMSolidaryPlane in times of COVID-19 https://t.co/xK9fWdY0se https://t.co/Fg6oAVfn4t

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @MFreylee Hi, if you need assistance with a reservation, send us the booking code through a DM to verify the information. Regards.
@velson_dsouza Hi, we've sent you a reply via DM. Thank you so much for contacting us. Regards.
@Mo73701081 We understand your position, and we have added your comments into your case 26795563. We will contact you as soon as we have a formal response. Regards.
@LagosJAntonio Te hemos enviado un mensaje vía DM. Saludos.

@LagosJAntonio Hola, debido al alto número de solicitudes los plazos están siendo mayores a los habituales y por lo cual no contamos con una fecha para realizar la transferencia. Nuestros equipos están haciendo el mayor esfuerzo posible para poder entregar una pronta respuesta. Saludos.

@ArianaGrandeNLD Hi, in order to evaluate your request, let us know via DM more information regarding your proposal, full name, email address, contact number and ID number. We'll be expecting for your reply in order escalate your inquiry. Kind regards.
@Mo73701081 Please wait for our contact. Regards.
@Mo73701081 Hi, send us through a DM the full name of the passenger, the routes and the dates of the flight, if you had a booking code, you can also send it to us. We await your reply.
@LuanneBuchana10 Hi, please send us a DM with her full name and booking code. Regards.
@LagosJAntonio Nos pondremos en contacto contigo en la brevedad posible respecto a tu requerimiento. Por favor, aguarda nuestro contacto. Saludos.
@LagosJAntonio Hola, toda información te lo enviaremos a través de tu correo en el menor tiempo posible. Saludos.
@toledofernanda Hello, we replied to your message via DM. Kind regards.

@degarrison Hi, sometimes our website can be affected by cookies or temporary files, so we suggest you try to access again from a different browser. If the error persists, please send us a screenshot via DM. If you need further assistance, please let us know.
@LagosJAntonio Hola, tu transferencia bancaria se encuentra en proceso, tan pronto se confirme te lo estaremos notificando. Saludos.
@mdamone21 It is regarding that booking code. We recommend you to hide your comment because it contains personal information. Regards.
